channel.title: Auto Update Name
channel.description:
hey mopars,
can somone tell me how to update the 126frames without logging out
exampel : you now got name "startter" but after a while when you get more xp your name get updated to "master" but the 126frames dont update it right away you need to log out en then you can see "master" so i want to know the way that it updates without logging out.
pic: [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/4439/tetslb5.png[/img]
Thx, supra

item.title: Auto Update Name
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“LeScape, post:2, topic:193113”]Create a boolean and a void, used like so.

public boolean hasAdvanced;
public void updateFrames() {
//frame126's here
hasAdvanced = false;
}

Then, wherever you had the frames before (where someone advances), put:

hasAdvanced = true;

Now in the boolean process:

if (hasAdvaned == true) {
updateFrames();
}

Voila.[/quote]

damit how could i forget that :o

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Update Name
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Create a boolean and a void, used like so.

public boolean hasAdvanced;
public void updateFrames() {
//frame126's here
hasAdvanced = false;
}

Then, wherever you had the frames before (where someone advances), put:

hasAdvanced = true;

Now in the boolean process:

if (hasAdvaned == true) {
updateFrames();
}

Voila.

Read full topic
